title: Chocolate Cupcakes with Caramel Icing
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '250g plain flour', '4 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '250ml water', '2 tablespoons grape jam', '250g mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Caramel icing', '50g butter, melted', '75ml single cream', '175g dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '220g icing sugar']
